channel.title: Comments on: The Cure postpone fall tour

item.title: By: Goths bone up on UV-protecting white face paint as The Cure reschedules tour dates for spring, Drawer B
item.dc:creator: Goths bone up on UV-protecting white face paint as The Cure reschedules tour dates for spring, Drawer B
item.description: [...] Cure has rescheduled the tour dates it recently canceled because Fat Bob was a little behind on his word count, which in turn caused a delay in the [...]
